title: One Piece
description: A boy named Luffy sets out to become the King of the Pirates in a world of adventure.

title: Lucifer
description: Lucifer Morningstar, the Devil, relocates to Los Angeles and runs a nightclub while becoming a consultant to the LAPD.

title: The Day of the Jackal
description: A gripping thriller about an assassin known as the Jackal and the hunt to stop him.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer faces moral decay and danger.

title: The Office (US)
description: A mockumentary sitcom about the everyday lives of office employees at Dunder Mifflin.

title: Game of thrones
description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns.

title: The Mentalist
description: A former psychic uses his keen observation skills to solve crimes for the CBI.
